Module com.ning.breakout

Package com.ning.breakout.controller

package com.ning.breakout.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.ning.breakout
     
    com.ning.breakout.model
     
    com.ning.breakout.view
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DebugConsoleController
    The controller class of the debug console, extends from the abstract class GameSceneController and defines the event handlers of the debug console.
    GameEndMenuController
    The controller class of the game end menu, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the game end menu.
    GameSceneController
    Abstract class GameSceneController is the base class for those controller classes whose scene is the sub-scene of the game board.
    GuidanceController
    The controller class of the guidance scene, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the guidance scene.
    KeyInputListener
    The controller class defines the key event listener for the whole game (designed for all scenes in the game, but only the listener for game board is implemented).
    MainMenuController
    The controller class of the main menu, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the main menu.
    NormalSceneController
    Abstract class NormalSceneController is the base class for those controllers whose scene is at the same level of the game board.
    PauseMenuController
    The controller class of the pause menu, extends from the abstract class GameSceneController and defines the event handlers of the pause menu.
    PreferencesController
    The controller class of the preference scene, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the preference scene.
    RankingListController
    The controller class of the ranking list, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the ranking list.
    UsernameFormController
    The controller class of the username form, extends from the abstract class NormalSceneController and defines the event handlers of the username form.
